name: EASTERN AIRWAYS SAAB 2000 - with the GoPro Hero 7 Black!
description:
I got two treats in one day this week - the new GoPro Hero 7 Black, and a ride on an Eastern Airways Saab 2000!  Here's my trip report of their domestic service from Leeds Bradford to Southampton, as well as of course footage and full review of the brand new GoPro Hero 7 Black, my favourite GoPro yet!  Is it any good for aviation videos?

EXCLUSIVE FULL FLIGHT VIDEOS AND MUCH MORE: BECOME A VIP TODAY AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
MERCH & MORE: http://inflightvideo.tv
